DOC.brief_summary: Colonoscopy accept gold standard screen colorectal cancer . However , small flat neoplastic lesion might overlook standard video endoscope . The new available EPKi system ( Pentax , Japan ) enable HD+ image resolution HDTV standard . Aim study test efficacy HD+ colonoscopy alone conjunction I-Scan ( newly develop post processing digital filter ) comparison standard videoendoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between HD+ Endoscopy Standard Videoendoscopy Screening Colonoscopy
